lyrics.stanza: Lord, You're with me when I'm by myself, Always comforting me when I'm lonely, You're the One in whom I find my true rest, And You satisfy me...
And now I see... Lord, You are the only One for me. And I see... You're the Friend who's with me constantly. And I see... Lord, You're living right inside of me. And I see, Lord You are for me.
You became a man to die for me, You shed Your blood that I might be redeemed, You loved me more than my words can ere tell, And You attracted me...
And now I see... Lord, You died and rose to save me to You. And I see... A divine romance with us human beings. And I see... You loved me before time ever began. And I see You really love me.
You're the One inside who cherishes me, Feeding me with milk from Your holy Word, Lord, You bring me just to feast upon You. And You feed me richly...

And now I see... You're the One who's always shepherding me. And I see... You're the One who's feeding, watering me. And I see... You're the One who loves me as Your sheep. And I see, Lord, You shepherd me.
Lord, I consecrate myself unto You, My time, my life, my riches; future too, You're the One on whom I'll pour everything, That's because I love You...

And now I see... You're the only One who's within my view. And I see... You're the One who I will give myself to. And I see... You're the only One who I will pursue. 'Cause I see, Lord, You are lovely.
Lord, without You I just cannot go on, You're the One in whom my life has meaning, I am absolutely for Your purpose, And I know why I live...
And now I see... You're the only One who I truly need. And I see... I am living for Your economy. And I see... It's because Your being captivates me. And I see I'm in love with You.
Lord, I've set my feet upon the track, Pressing onward just to fulfill Your dream, And may I nevermore turn my head back, 'Cause I am just for You...
And now I see... Lord, You've drawn me away to Yourself. And I see... I'm pursuing You, Lord, wholeheartedly. And I see... There is nothing else on earth for me. And I see, Lord, You are my goal.
